titles.title: Foster Youth Independence Act of 2017
Foster Youth Independence Act of 2017

A bill to amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to allow States that provide foster care for children up to age 21 to serve former foster youths through age 23 under the John H. Chafee Foster Care Independence Program.
Foster Youth Independence Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
